Token.Abstract: TICDLog is a utility class to provide the primary logging behavior for the TICoreDataSync framework.
Returns the current verbosity level for logging.
Sets the verbosity level for logging.
Log some information (assuming DEBUG is set).

Parameter.Name: someVerbosity
Parameter.Abstract: The verbosity level of this information (if the current verbosity is less than this, the information won't be logged).

Parameter.Name: formatString
Parameter.Abstract: The format string (using NSLog() format specifiers).
A comma-separated list of arguments to substitute into formatString.

Token.Abstract: Log some information (assuming DEBUG is set).

Parameter.Name: someVerbosity
Parameter.Abstract: The verbosity level of this information (if the current verbosity is less than this, the information won't be logged).

Parameter.Name: formatString
Parameter.Abstract: The format string (using NSLog() format specifiers).

Parameter.Name: args
Parameter.Abstract: A correctly started va_list with the arguments to substitute into formatString.
